name: Gunballin
description:
Gunball! (coop)

Basic gameplay working well enough, give it a try! :D

Smash balls into your opponents goal, first to 5 is the champ! Works best with gamepads!

1 - Fullscreen // Esc - Restart

Controls Gamepad -

Boost A (xbox) X (playstation)

Shoot X (xbox) Square (playstation)

Controls Keyboard -

Player1 - WASD // E boost // Space shoot

Player2 - ArrowKeys // Numpad 0 boost // Ctrl shoot
